We are the marketplace for second-hand goods in Spain. With more than 8 million searches per day and over 15 million users across Spain with a catalog of several hundreds of millions of products, we exist to empower people to promote a more conscious and human way of consumption. We achieve this by bringing together the scale and simplicity of classifieds with the convenience and the reach of marketplace to create the worldâ€™s best unique goods trading platform.&nbsp;\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cbr\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EWallapop takes pride in having an open culture, where every opinion matters and everybody contributes in many different ways; through different internal cross-functional clubs aligning with peopleâ€™s passions and interests.&nbsp;\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cbr\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EWe count 26 nationalities within our employee base and we operate in 2 languages:&nbsp;Spanish and English - this makes us pretty fun and special. While in most cases we are not attached to one language or the other, we encourage talent to embrace both languages and be able to operate outside their comfort zone. To ensure success we facilitate group and individual Spanish and English classes as part of our working day.\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cbr\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EOur company \u003Cstrong\u003Evalues\u003C/strong\u003E are:\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EWe are One Team: Communicative, trusting and inclusive\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EWe Dream &amp; Deliver: Creative, impactful, pragmatic\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EWe Aim for Simplicity: Intentional, uncomplicated, humble\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EWe Learn &amp; Grow: Constructive feedback, curiosity\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cbr\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E&nbsp;We organize ourselves into topic teams and embrace agile practices.\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cbr\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EThe&nbsp;\u003Cstrong\u003Eday to day&nbsp;as a Backend Engineer \u003C/strong\u003Einvolves:\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cul\u003E\u003Cli\u003EWriting Java or Kotlin code, it depends on the team, the stack could change a little bit\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003EDeveloping new features following DDD (tactical design and strategical design)\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003ETackling legacy parts\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003ETesting all the things! We use many different AWS technologies (computer, storage ...) to archive our goals. As a Wallapop backend engineer, we have ownership of the team microservices, so we really embrace DevOps philosophy (optionally backend stuff is who are on duty). Itâ€™s difficult to explain our stack but the most important parts are:\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EÂ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Java &amp; Kotlin\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EÂ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Spring &amp; Axon Framework\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EÂ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;RabbitMQ\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EÂ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;MySql, DynamoDb, Redis &amp; Memcached\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EÂ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Docker\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EÂ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ElasticSearch &amp; Solr\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EÂ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;AWS: S3, ECS, CloudWatch, RDS, CloudFormation, Lambdas &amp; more\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cbr\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EWe are really friendly and expect any new members to join us to be respectful, appreciate diversity, and have a sense of humor.          <ul class="typeahead-input__dropdown-list" id="job-search-bar-location-typeahead-list" role="listbox"></ul>
        </div>

    <section class="description">
     <div class="message-the-recruiter">
      <p>Enviar mensaje directo al anunciante de Wallapop</p>
      <div class="base-main-card">
       <img class="artdeco-entity-image artdeco-entity-image--profile artdeco-entity-image--circle-4 lazy-load" data-delayed-url="https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQGLinNmSpN1PA/profile-displayphoto-shrink_100_100/0?e=1611187200&amp;v=beta&amp;t=JrGvlxdHIe0OlNkh5jpEQSRTO4brG8Ibnk7WEBK8hyM" data-ghost-classes="artdeco-entity-image--ghost artdeco-entity-image--ghost-profile" data-ghost-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/efkb5179rslll10nmhystl3wx" alt="JesÃºs Horcajo">
       <div class="base-main-card__info">
        <h3 class="base-main-card__title">JesÃºs Horcajo</h3>
        <h4 class="base-main-card__subtitle">Talent Acquisition en Wallapop</h4>
       </div><a aria-label="Enviar mensaje a JesÃºs Horcajo" class="message-the-recruiter__cta" href="https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fes%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fin%2Fjesushorcajo&amp;emailAddress=&amp;fromSignIn=&amp;trk=public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-will-navigate>
        <icon class="message-the-recruiter__cta-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/em62t8ujch4hqqc45owxy6auu" data-tracking-will-navigate /></a>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
      <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
       <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
        <p>Wallapop was founded in 2013. We are the marketplace for second-hand goods in Spain. With more than 8 million searches per day and over 15 million users across Spain with a catalog of several hundreds of millions of products, we exist to empower people to promote a more conscious and human way of consumption. We achieve this by bringing together the scale and simplicity of classifieds with the convenience and the reach of marketplace to create the worldâ€™s best unique goods trading platform.&nbsp;</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>Wallapop takes pride in having an open culture, where every opinion matters and everybody contributes in many different ways; through different internal cross-functional clubs aligning with peopleâ€™s passions and interests.&nbsp;</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>We count 26 nationalities within our employee base and we operate in 2 languages:&nbsp;Spanish and English - this makes us pretty fun and special. While in most cases we are not attached to one language or the other, we encourage talent to embrace both languages and be able to operate outside their comfort zone. To ensure success we facilitate group and individual Spanish and English classes as part of our working day.</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>Our company <strong>values</strong> are:</p>
        <p>We are One Team: Communicative, trusting and inclusive</p>
        <p>We Dream &amp; Deliver: Creative, impactful, pragmatic</p>
        <p>We Aim for Simplicity: Intentional, uncomplicated, humble</p>
        <p>We Learn &amp; Grow: Constructive feedback, curiosity</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>&nbsp;We organize ourselves into topic teams and embrace agile practices.</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>The&nbsp;<strong>day to day&nbsp;as a Backend Engineer </strong>involves:</p>
        <ul>
         <li>Writing Java or Kotlin code, it depends on the team, the stack could change a little bit</li>
         <li>Developing new features following DDD (tactical design and strategical design)</li>
         <li>Tackling legacy parts</li>
         <li>Testing all the things! Testing is a must, especially if you want to avoid those friendly reminders during the code review</li>
        </ul>
        <p>&nbsp;</p>
        <p><strong>The challenge</strong></p>
        <p>Some of the interesting things we are currently doing include finding new ways to handle with complexity or improve resiliency. We use many different AWS technologies (computer, storage ...) to archive our goals. As a Wallapop backend engineer, we have ownership of the team microservices, so we really embrace DevOps philosophy (optionally backend stuff is who are on duty). Itâ€™s difficult to explain our stack but the most important parts are:</p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Java &amp; Kotlin</p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Spring &amp; Axon Framework</p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;RabbitMQ</p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;MySql, DynamoDb, Redis &amp; Memcached</p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Docker</p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ElasticSearch &amp; Solr</p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;AWS: S3, ECS, CloudWatch, RDS, CloudFormation, Lambdas &amp; more</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>We are really friendly and expect any new members to join us to be respectful, appreciate diversity, and have a sense of humor. We are constantly learning new technologies, acquiring new skills, as things change fast at Wallapop. And Wallapop is aware of that fact, so every employee has a budget for courses and conferences.</p>
        <p>&nbsp;</p>
        <p><strong>Who you are</strong></p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Problem solver and critical thinking</p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Quality driven, attention to detail and pragmatic Ì£</p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Adaptable and eager to learn</p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A sense of humor: we like having fun doing what we love :)</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p><strong>Wallapop is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees</strong></p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>Our <strong>hiring process</strong>:&nbsp;</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>* PLEASE NOTE THAT DUE TO THE CURRENT COVID19 SITUATION ALL INTERVIEWS TAKE PLACE REMOTELY OVER HANGOUTS*</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <ol>
         <li><strong>Intro Call</strong> - ran by talent acquisition. It will take 30-45 minutes and will focus on giving you more information about the role and the company as well as going over your experience and expectations.</li>
         <li><strong>Take-home test: </strong>you will be assigned a test that you should complete in few days which is aimed at assessing your technical skills required for the role.&nbsp;</li>
         <li><strong>Competency Interview</strong> - ran by talent acquisition and hiring manager. We will focus on gaining insights and understanding of how you operate in the workplace and your fit to our values. This usually takes 45 min to 1 hour.</li>
         <li><strong>Practical interview -</strong> ran by the hiring team and relevant stakeholders across other functions. The focus will be on assessing your ability to apply your skillset to the wallapop context.&nbsp;</li>
         <li><strong>Offer</strong> - should you be the right candidate, your offer will be discussed over a call with talent acquisition and will then be confirmed in writing.&nbsp;</li>
        </ol>
        <p><br></p>
        <p><strong>Benefits</strong></p>
        <ul>
         <li>Flexible working hours</li>
         <li>Reduced hours on Fridays</li>
         <li>Personal learning budget</li>
         <li>English/Spanish lessons</li>
         <li>Encouraging, fun and team-focused offsite trips twice a year</li>
         <li>Team building activities</li>
         <li>Private Health Insurance (Cigna)</li>
         <li>Gym discounts</li>
         <li>Free office sports classes.</li>
         <li>Other benefits paid from the gross salary (kindergarten check, food check, transport check).</li>
         <li>You'll enjoy a 50% longer maternity/paternity leave</li>
         <li>New born or adoption bonus</li>
         <li>Referral Program &amp; charity donation</li>
         <li>Tax Advice</li>
        </ul>

     </div>

    <section class="description">
     <div class="message-the-recruiter">
      <p>Enviar mensaje directo al anunciante de Wallapop</p>
      <div class="base-main-card">
       <img class="artdeco-entity-image artdeco-entity-image--profile artdeco-entity-image--circle-4 lazy-load" data-delayed-url="https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQGLinNmSpN1PA/profile-displayphoto-shrink_100_100/0?e=1611187200&amp;v=beta&amp;t=JrGvlxdHIe0OlNkh5jpEQSRTO4brG8Ibnk7WEBK8hyM" data-ghost-classes="artdeco-entity-image--ghost artdeco-entity-image--ghost-profile" data-ghost-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/efkb5179rslll10nmhystl3wx" alt="JesÃºs Horcajo">
       <div class="base-main-card__info">
        <h3 class="base-main-card__title">JesÃºs Horcajo</h3>
        <h4 class="base-main-card__subtitle">Talent Acquisition en Wallapop</h4>
       </div><a aria-label="Enviar mensaje a JesÃºs Horcajo" class="message-the-recruiter__cta" href="https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fes%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fin%2Fjesushorcajo&amp;emailAddress=&amp;fromSignIn=&amp;trk=public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-will-navigate>
        <icon class="message-the-recruiter__cta-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/em62t8ujch4hqqc45owxy6auu" data-tracking-will-navigate /></a>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
      <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
       <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
        <p>Wallapop was founded in 2013. We are the marketplace for second-hand goods in Spain. With more than 8 million searches per day and over 15 million users across Spain with a catalog of several hundreds of millions of products, we exist to empower people to promote a more conscious and human way of consumption. We achieve this by bringing together the scale and simplicity of classifieds with the convenience and the reach of marketplace to create the worldâ€™s best unique goods trading platform.&nbsp;</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>Wallapop takes pride in having an open culture, where every opinion matters and everybody contributes in many different ways; through different internal cross-functional clubs aligning with peopleâ€™s passions and interests.&nbsp;</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>We count 26 nationalities within our employee base and we operate in 2 languages:&nbsp;Spanish and English - this makes us pretty fun and special. While in most cases we are not attached to one language or the other, we encourage talent to embrace both languages and be able to operate outside their comfort zone. To ensure success we facilitate group and individual Spanish and English classes as part of our working day.</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>Our company <strong>values</strong> are:</p>
        <p>We are One Team: Communicative, trusting and inclusive</p>
        <p>We Dream &amp; Deliver: Creative, impactful, pragmatic</p>
        <p>We Aim for Simplicity: Intentional, uncomplicated, humble</p>
        <p>We Learn &amp; Grow: Constructive feedback, curiosity</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>&nbsp;We organize ourselves into topic teams and embrace agile practices.</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>The&nbsp;<strong>day to day&nbsp;as a Backend Engineer </strong>involves:</p>
        <ul>
         <li>Writing Java or Kotlin code, it depends on the team, the stack could change a little bit</li>
         <li>Developing new features following DDD (tactical design and strategical design)</li>
         <li>Tackling legacy parts</li>
         <li>Testing all the things! Testing is a must, especially if you want to avoid those friendly reminders during the code review</li>
        </ul>
        <p>&nbsp;</p>
        <p><strong>The challenge</strong></p>
        <p>Some of the interesting things we are currently doing include finding new ways to handle with complexity or improve resiliency. We use many different AWS technologies (computer, storage ...) to archive our goals. As a Wallapop backend engineer, we have ownership of the team microservices, so we really embrace DevOps philosophy (optionally backend stuff is who are on duty). Itâ€™s difficult to explain our stack but the most important parts are:</p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Java &amp; Kotlin</p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Spring &amp; Axon Framework</p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;RabbitMQ</p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;MySql, DynamoDb, Redis &amp; Memcached</p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Docker</p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ElasticSearch &amp; Solr</p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;AWS: S3, ECS, CloudWatch, RDS, CloudFormation, Lambdas &amp; more</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>We are really friendly and expect any new members to join us to be respectful, appreciate diversity, and have a sense of humor. We are constantly learning new technologies, acquiring new skills, as things change fast at Wallapop. And Wallapop is aware of that fact, so every employee has a budget for courses and conferences.</p>
        <p>&nbsp;</p>
        <p><strong>Who you are</strong></p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Problem solver and critical thinking</p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Quality driven, attention to detail and pragmatic Ì£</p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Adaptable and eager to learn</p>
        <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A sense of humor: we like having fun doing what we love :)</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p><strong>Wallapop is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees</strong></p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>Our <strong>hiring process</strong>:&nbsp;</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <p>* PLEASE NOTE THAT DUE TO THE CURRENT COVID19 SITUATION ALL INTERVIEWS TAKE PLACE REMOTELY OVER HANGOUTS*</p>
        <p><br></p>
        <ol>
         <li><strong>Intro Call</strong> - ran by talent acquisition. It will take 30-45 minutes and will focus on giving you more information about the role and the company as well as going over your experience and expectations.</li>
         <li><strong>Take-home test: </strong>you will be assigned a test that you should complete in few days which is aimed at assessing your technical skills required for the role.&nbsp;</li>
         <li><strong>Competency Interview</strong> - ran by talent acquisition and hiring manager. We will focus on gaining insights and understanding of how you operate in the workplace and your fit to our values. This usually takes 45 min to 1 hour.</li>
         <li><strong>Practical interview -</strong> ran by the hiring team and relevant stakeholders across other functions. The focus will be on assessing your ability to apply your skillset to the wallapop context.&nbsp;</li>
         <li><strong>Offer</strong> - should you be the right candidate, your offer will be discussed over a call with talent acquisition and will then be confirmed in writing.&nbsp;</li>
        </ol>
        <p><br></p>
        <p><strong>Benefits</strong></p>
        <ul>
         <li>Flexible working hours</li>
         <li>Reduced hours on Fridays</li>
         <li>Personal learning budget</li>
         <li>English/Spanish lessons</li>
         <li>Encouraging, fun and team-focused offsite trips twice a year</li>
         <li>Team building activities</li>
         <li>Private Health Insurance (Cigna)</li>
         <li>Gym discounts</li>
         <li>Free office sports classes.</li>
         <li>Other benefits paid from the gross salary (kindergarten check, food check, transport check).</li>
         <li>You'll enjoy a 50% longer maternity/paternity leave</li>
         <li>New born or adoption bonus</li>
         <li>Referral Program &amp; charity donation</li>
         <li>Tax Advice</li>
        </ul>
       </div><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--more" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-more-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar mÃ¡s" aria-expanded="false">Mostrar mÃ¡s
        <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/cyolgscd0imw2ldqppkrb84vo" /></button><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--less" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-less-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar menos" aria-expanded="true">Mostrar menos

 <script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"http://schema.org","@type":"JobPosting","datePosted":"2020-11-11T09:05:37.000Z","description":"\u003Cp\u003EWallapop was founded in 2013. We are the marketplace for second-hand goods in Spain. With more than 8 million searches per day and over 15 million users across Spain with a catalog of several hundreds of millions of products, we exist to empower people to promote a more conscious and human way of consumption. We achieve this by bringing together the scale and simplicity of classifieds with the convenience and the reach of marketplace to create the worldâ€™s best unique goods trading platform.&nbsp;\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cbr\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EWallapop takes pride in having an open culture, where every opinion matters and everybody contributes in many different ways; through different internal cross-functional clubs aligning with peopleâ€™s passions and interests.&nbsp;\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cbr\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EWe count 26 nationalities within our employee base and we operate in 2 languages:&nbsp;Spanish and English - this makes us pretty fun and special. While in most cases we are not attached to one language or the other, we encourage talent to embrace both languages and be able to operate outside their comfort zone. To ensure success we facilitate group and individual Spanish and English classes as part of our working day.\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cbr\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EOur company \u003Cstrong\u003Evalues\u003C/strong\u003E are:\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EWe are One Team: Communicative, trusting and inclusive\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EWe Dream &amp; Deliver: Creative, impactful, pragmatic\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EWe Aim for Simplicity: Intentional, uncomplicated, humble\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EWe Learn &amp; Grow: Constructive feedback, curiosity\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cbr\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E&nbsp;We organize ourselves into topic teams and embrace agile practices.\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cbr\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EThe&nbsp;\u003Cstrong\u003Eday to day&nbsp;as a Backend Engineer \u003C/strong\u003Einvolves:\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cul\u003E\u003Cli\u003EWriting Java or Kotlin code, it depends on the team, the stack could change a little bit\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003EDeveloping new features following DDD (tactical design and strategical design)\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003ETackling legacy parts\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003ETesting all the things! Testing is a must, especially if you want to avoid those friendly reminders during the code review\u003C/li\u003E\u003C/ul\u003E\u003Cp\u003E&nbsp;\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EThe challenge\u003C/strong\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003ESome of the interesting things we are currently doing include finding new ways to handle with complexity or improve resiliency. We use many different AWS technologies (computer, storage ...) to archive our goals. As a Wallapop backend engineer, we have ownership of the team microservices, so we really embrace DevOps philosophy (optionally backend stuff is who are on duty). Itâ€™s difficult to explain our stack but the most important parts are:\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EÂ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Java &amp; Kotlin\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EÂ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Spring &amp; Axon Framework\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EÂ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;RabbitMQ\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EÂ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;MySql, DynamoDb, Redis &amp; Memcached\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EÂ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Docker\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EÂ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ElasticSearch &amp; Solr\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EÂ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;AWS: S3, ECS, CloudWatch, RDS, CloudFormation, Lambdas &amp; more\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cbr\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EWe are really friendly and expect any new members to join us to be respectful, appreciate diversity, and have a sense of humor. We are constantly learning new technologies, acquiring new skills, as things change fast at Wallapop. And Wallapop is aware of that fact, so every employee has a budget for courses and conferences.\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E&nbsp;\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EWho you are\u003C/strong\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EÂ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Problem solver and critical thinking\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EÂ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Quality driven, attention to detail and pragmatic Ì£\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EÂ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Adaptable and eager to learn\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EÂ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A sense of humor: we like having fun doing what we love :)\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cbr\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EWallapop is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees\u003C/strong\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cbr\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003EOur \u003Cstrong\u003Ehiring process\u003C/strong\u003E:&nbsp;\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cbr\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E* PLEASE NOTE THAT DUE TO THE CURRENT COVID19 SITUATION ALL INTERVIEWS TAKE PLACE REMOTELY OVER HANGOUTS*\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cbr\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Col\u003E\u003Cli\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EIntro Call\u003C/strong\u003E - ran by talent acquisition. It will take 30-45 minutes and will focus on giving you more information about the role and the company as well as going over your experience and expectations.\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003ETake-home test: \u003C/strong\u003Eyou will be assigned a test that you should complete in few days which is aimed at assessing your technical skills required for the role.&nbsp;\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003ECompetency Interview\u003C/strong\u003E - ran by talent acquisition and hiring manager. We will focus on gaining insights and understanding of how you operate in the workplace and your fit to our values. This usually takes 45 min to 1 hour.\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EPractical interview -\u003C/strong\u003E ran by the hiring team and relevant stakeholders across other functions. The focus will be on assessing your ability to apply your skillset to the wallapop context.&nbsp;\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EOffer\u003C/strong\u003E - should you be the right candidate, your offer will be discussed over a call with talent acquisition and will then be confirmed in writing.&nbsp;\u003C/li\u003E\u003C/ol\u003E\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cbr\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cp\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EBenefits\u003C/strong\u003E\u003C/p\u003E\u003Cul\u003E\u003Cli\u003EFlexible working hours\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003EReduced hours on Fridays\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003EPersonal learning budget\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003EEnglish/Spanish lessons\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003EEncouraging, fun and team-focused offsite trips twice a year\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003ETeam building activities\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003EPrivate Health Insurance (Cigna)\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003EGym discounts\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003EFree office sports classes.\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003EOther benefits paid from the gross salary (kindergarten check, food check, transport check).\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003EYou'll enjoy a 50% longer maternity/paternity leave\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003ENew born or adoption bonus\u003C/li\u003E\u003Cli\u003EReferral Program &amp;      <img class="artdeco-entity-image artdeco-entity-image--job artdeco-entity-image--square-3 sub-nav-cta__image lazy-load" data-delayed-url="https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQEH2KKHpM7Fwg/company-logo_100_100/0?e=1614211200&amp;v=beta&amp;t=cNbL6S2XzTzxNr3Q9Tm3OZ0JuBQ2lFXy7GHwqhwPlcw" data-ghost-classes="artdeco-entity-image--ghost artdeco-entity-image--ghost-job" data-ghost-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/7f96nmq8d6l97cwzsidw3ye9b" alt="Wallapop">
     <div class="sub-nav-cta__text-container">
      <h3 class="sub-nav-cta__header">Backend Engineer (Kotlin/Java)</h3>

   <section class="description">
    <div class="message-the-recruiter">
     <p>Enviar mensaje directo al anunciante de Wallapop</p>
     <div class="base-main-card">
      <img class="artdeco-entity-image artdeco-entity-image--profile artdeco-entity-image--circle-4 lazy-load" data-delayed-url="https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQGLinNmSpN1PA/profile-displayphoto-shrink_100_100/0?e=1611187200&amp;v=beta&amp;t=JrGvlxdHIe0OlNkh5jpEQSRTO4brG8Ibnk7WEBK8hyM" data-ghost-classes="artdeco-entity-image--ghost artdeco-entity-image--ghost-profile" data-ghost-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/efkb5179rslll10nmhystl3wx" alt="JesÃºs Horcajo">
      <div class="base-main-card__info">
       <h3 class="base-main-card__title">JesÃºs Horcajo</h3>
       <h4 class="base-main-card__subtitle">Talent Acquisition en Wallapop</h4>
      </div><a aria-label="Enviar mensaje a JesÃºs Horcajo" class="message-the-recruiter__cta" href="https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fes%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fin%2Fjesushorcajo&amp;emailAddress=&amp;fromSignIn=&amp;trk=public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-will-navigate>
       <icon class="message-the-recruiter__cta-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/em62t8ujch4hqqc45owxy6auu" data-tracking-will-navigate /></a>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
     <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
      <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
       <p>Wallapop was founded in 2013. We are the marketplace for second-hand goods in Spain. With more than 8 million searches per day and over 15 million users across Spain with a catalog of several hundreds of millions of products, we exist to empower people to promote a more conscious and human way of consumption. We achieve this by bringing together the scale and simplicity of classifieds with the convenience and the reach of marketplace to create the worldâ€™s best unique goods trading platform.&nbsp;</p>
       <p><br></p>
       <p>Wallapop takes pride in having an open culture, where every opinion matters and everybody contributes in many different ways; through different internal cross-functional clubs aligning with peopleâ€™s passions and interests.&nbsp;</p>
       <p><br></p>
       <p>We count 26 nationalities within our employee base and we operate in 2 languages:&nbsp;Spanish and English - this makes us pretty fun and special. While in most cases we are not attached to one language or the other, we encourage talent to embrace both languages and be able to operate outside their comfort zone. To ensure success we facilitate group and individual Spanish and English classes as part of our working day.</p>
       <p><br></p>
       <p>Our company <strong>values</strong> are:</p>
       <p>We are One Team: Communicative, trusting and inclusive</p>
       <p>We Dream &amp; Deliver: Creative, impactful, pragmatic</p>
       <p>We Aim for Simplicity: Intentional, uncomplicated, humble</p>
       <p>We Learn &amp; Grow: Constructive feedback, curiosity</p>
       <p><br></p>
       <p>&nbsp;We organize ourselves into topic teams and embrace agile practices.</p>
       <p><br></p>
       <p>The&nbsp;<strong>day to day&nbsp;as a Backend Engineer </strong>involves:</p>
       <ul>
        <li>Writing Java or Kotlin code, it depends on the team, the stack could change a little bit</li>
        <li>Developing new features following DDD (tactical design and strategical design)</li>
        <li>Tackling legacy parts</li>
        <li>Testing all the things! Testing is a must, especially if you want to avoid those friendly reminders during the code review</li>
       </ul>
       <p>&nbsp;</p>
       <p><strong>The challenge</strong></p>
       <p>Some of the interesting things we are currently doing include finding new ways to handle with complexity or improve resiliency. We use many different AWS technologies (computer, storage ...) to archive our goals. As a Wallapop backend engineer, we have ownership of the team microservices, so we really embrace DevOps philosophy (optionally backend stuff is who are on duty). Itâ€™s difficult to explain our stack but the most important parts are:</p>
       <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Java &amp; Kotlin</p>
       <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Spring &amp; Axon Framework</p>
       <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;RabbitMQ</p>
       <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;MySql, DynamoDb, Redis &amp; Memcached</p>
       <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Docker</p>
       <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ElasticSearch &amp; Solr</p>
       <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;AWS: S3, ECS, CloudWatch, RDS, CloudFormation, Lambdas &amp; more</p>
       <p><br></p>
       <p>We are really friendly and expect any new members to join us to be respectful, appreciate diversity, and have a sense of humor. We are constantly learning new technologies, acquiring new skills, as things change fast at Wallapop. And Wallapop is aware of that fact, so every employee has a budget for courses and conferences.</p>
       <p>&nbsp;</p>
       <p><strong>Who you are</strong></p>
       <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Problem solver and critical thinking</p>
       <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Quality driven, attention to detail and pragmatic Ì£</p>
       <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Adaptable and eager to learn</p>
       <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A sense of humor: we like having fun doing what we love :)</p>
       <p><br></p>
       <p><strong>Wallapop is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees</strong></p>
       <p><br></p>
       <p>Our <strong>hiring process</strong>:&nbsp;</p>
       <p><br></p>
       <p>* PLEASE NOTE THAT DUE TO THE CURRENT COVID19 SITUATION ALL INTERVIEWS TAKE PLACE REMOTELY OVER HANGOUTS*</p>
       <p><br></p>
       <ol>
        <li><strong>Intro Call</strong> - ran by talent acquisition. It will take 30-45 minutes and will focus on giving you more information about the role and the company as well as going over your experience and expectations.</li>
        <li><strong>Take-home test: </strong>you will be assigned a test that you should complete in few days which is aimed at assessing your technical skills required for the role.&nbsp;</li>
        <li><strong>Competency Interview</strong> - ran by talent acquisition and hiring manager. We will focus on gaining insights and understanding of how you operate in the workplace and your fit to our values. This usually takes 45 min to 1 hour.</li>
        <li><strong>Practical interview -</strong> ran by the hiring team and relevant stakeholders across other functions. The focus will be on assessing your ability to apply your skillset to the wallapop context.&nbsp;</li>
        <li><strong>Offer</strong> - should you be the right candidate, your offer will be discussed over a call with talent acquisition and will then be confirmed in writing.&nbsp;</li>
       </ol>
       <p><br></p>
       <p><strong>Benefits</strong></p>
       <ul>
        <li>Flexible working hours</li>
        <li>Reduced hours on Fridays</li>
        <li>Personal learning budget</li>
        <li>English/Spanish lessons</li>
        <li>Encouraging, fun and team-focused offsite trips twice a year</li>
        <li>Team building activities</li>
        <li>Private Health Insurance (Cigna)</li>
        <li>Gym discounts</li>
        <li>Free office sports classes.</li>
        <li>Other benefits paid from the gross salary (kindergarten check, food check, transport check).</li>
        <li>You'll enjoy a 50% longer maternity/paternity leave</li>
        <li>New born or adoption bonus</li>
        <li>Referral Program &amp; charity donation</li>
        <li>Tax Advice</li>
       </ul>
      </div><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--more" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-more-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar mÃ¡s" aria-expanded="false">Mostrar mÃ¡s
       <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/cyolgscd0imw2ldqppkrb84vo" /></button><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--less" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-less-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar menos" aria-expanded="true">Mostrar menos
       <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/4chtt12k98xwnba1nimld2oyg" /></button>

     <li class="job-criteria__item"><h3 class="job-criteria__subheader">Nivel de antigÃ¼edad</h3><span class="job-criteria__text job-criteria__text--criteria">Algo de responsabilidad</span></li>
     <li class="job-criteria__item"><h3 class="job-criteria__subheader">Tipo de empleo</h3><span class="job-criteria__text job-criteria__text--criteria">Jornada completa</span></li>

      <icon class="dismissable-input__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/cs55jggk4p3uqh9ozxdmpvjg7"></icon></button>

  <section class="description">
   <div class="message-the-recruiter">
    <p>Enviar mensaje directo al anunciante de Wallapop</p>
    <div class="base-main-card">
     <img class="artdeco-entity-image artdeco-entity-image--profile artdeco-entity-image--circle-4 lazy-load" data-delayed-url="https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQGLinNmSpN1PA/profile-displayphoto-shrink_100_100/0?e=1611187200&amp;v=beta&amp;t=JrGvlxdHIe0OlNkh5jpEQSRTO4brG8Ibnk7WEBK8hyM" data-ghost-classes="artdeco-entity-image--ghost artdeco-entity-image--ghost-profile" data-ghost-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/efkb5179rslll10nmhystl3wx" alt="JesÃºs Horcajo">
     <div class="base-main-card__info">
      <h3 class="base-main-card__title">JesÃºs Horcajo</h3>
      <h4 class="base-main-card__subtitle">Talent Acquisition en Wallapop</h4>
     </div><a aria-label="Enviar mensaje a JesÃºs Horcajo" class="message-the-recruiter__cta" href="https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fes%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fin%2Fjesushorcajo&amp;emailAddress=&amp;fromSignIn=&amp;trk=public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-will-navigate>
      <icon class="message-the-recruiter__cta-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/em62t8ujch4hqqc45owxy6auu" data-tracking-will-navigate /></a>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
    <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
     <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
      <p>Wallapop was founded in 2013. We are the marketplace for second-hand goods in Spain. With more than 8 million searches per day and over 15 million users across Spain with a catalog of several hundreds of millions of products, we exist to empower people to promote a more conscious and human way of consumption. We achieve this by bringing together the scale and simplicity of classifieds with the convenience and the reach of marketplace to create the worldâ€™s best unique goods trading platform.&nbsp;</p>
      <p><br></p>
      <p>Wallapop takes pride in having an open culture, where every opinion matters and everybody contributes in many different ways; through different internal cross-functional clubs aligning with peopleâ€™s passions and interests.&nbsp;</p>
      <p><br></p>
      <p>We count 26 nationalities within our employee base and we operate in 2 languages:&nbsp;Spanish and English - this makes us pretty fun and special. While in most cases we are not attached to one language or the other, we encourage talent to embrace both languages and be able to operate outside their comfort zone. To ensure success we facilitate group and individual Spanish and English classes as part of our working day.</p>
      <p><br></p>
      <p>Our company <strong>values</strong> are:</p>
      <p>We are One Team: Communicative, trusting and inclusive</p>
      <p>We Dream &amp; Deliver: Creative, impactful, pragmatic</p>
      <p>We Aim for Simplicity: Intentional, uncomplicated, humble</p>
      <p>We Learn &amp; Grow: Constructive feedback, curiosity</p>
      <p><br></p>
      <p>&nbsp;We organize ourselves into topic teams and embrace agile practices.</p>
      <p><br></p>
      <p>The&nbsp;<strong>day to day&nbsp;as a Backend Engineer </strong>involves:</p>
      <ul>
       <li>Writing Java or Kotlin code, it depends on the team, the stack could change a little bit</li>
       <li>Developing new features following DDD (tactical design and strategical design)</li>
       <li>Tackling legacy parts</li>
       <li>Testing all the things! Testing is a must, especially if you want to avoid those friendly reminders during the code review</li>
      </ul>
      <p>&nbsp;</p>
      <p><strong>The challenge</strong></p>
      <p>Some of the interesting things we are currently doing include finding new ways to handle with complexity or improve resiliency. We use many different AWS technologies (computer, storage ...) to archive our goals. As a Wallapop backend engineer, we have ownership of the team microservices, so we really embrace DevOps philosophy (optionally backend stuff is who are on duty). Itâ€™s difficult to explain our stack but the most important parts are:</p>
      <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Java &amp; Kotlin</p>
      <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Spring &amp; Axon Framework</p>
      <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;RabbitMQ</p>
      <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;MySql, DynamoDb, Redis &amp; Memcached</p>
      <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Docker</p>
      <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ElasticSearch &amp; Solr</p>
      <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;AWS: S3, ECS, CloudWatch, RDS, CloudFormation, Lambdas &amp; more</p>
      <p><br></p>
      <p>We are really friendly and expect any new members to join us to be respectful, appreciate diversity, and have a sense of humor. We are constantly learning new technologies, acquiring new skills, as things change fast at Wallapop. And Wallapop is aware of that fact, so every employee has a budget for courses and conferences.</p>
      <p>&nbsp;</p>
      <p><strong>Who you are</strong></p>
      <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Problem solver and critical thinking</p>
      <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Quality driven, attention to detail and pragmatic Ì£</p>
      <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Adaptable and eager to learn</p>
      <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A sense of humor: we like having fun doing what we love :)</p>
      <p><br></p>
      <p><strong>Wallapop is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees</strong></p>
      <p><br></p>
      <p>Our <strong>hiring process</strong>:&nbsp;</p>
      <p><br></p>
      <p>* PLEASE NOTE THAT DUE TO THE CURRENT COVID19 SITUATION ALL INTERVIEWS TAKE PLACE REMOTELY OVER HANGOUTS*</p>
      <p><br></p>
      <ol>
       <li><strong>Intro Call</strong> - ran by talent acquisition. It will take 30-45 minutes and will focus on giving you more information about the role and the company as well as going over your experience and expectations.</li>
       <li><strong>Take-home test: </strong>you will be assigned a test that you should complete in few days which is aimed at assessing your technical skills required for the role.&nbsp;</li>
       <li><strong>Competency Interview</strong> - ran by talent acquisition and hiring manager. We will focus on gaining insights and understanding of how you operate in the workplace and your fit to our values. This usually takes 45 min to 1 hour.</li>
       <li><strong>Practical interview -</strong> ran by the hiring team and relevant stakeholders across other functions. The focus will be on assessing your ability to apply your skillset to the wallapop context.&nbsp;</li>
       <li><strong>Offer</strong> - should you be the right candidate, your offer will be discussed over a call with talent acquisition and will then be confirmed in writing.&nbsp;</li>
      </ol>
      <p><br></p>
      <p><strong>Benefits</strong></p>
      <ul>
       <li>Flexible working hours</li>
       <li>Reduced hours on Fridays</li>
       <li>Personal learning budget</li>
       <li>English/Spanish lessons</li>
       <li>Encouraging, fun and team-focused offsite trips twice a year</li>
       <li>Team building activities</li>
       <li>Private Health Insurance (Cigna)</li>
       <li>Gym discounts</li>
       <li>Free office sports classes.</li>
       <li>Other benefits paid from the gross salary (kindergarten check, food check, transport check).</li>
       <li>You'll enjoy a 50% longer maternity/paternity leave</li>
       <li>New born or adoption bonus</li>
       <li>Referral Program &amp; charity donation</li>
       <li>Tax Advice</li>
      </ul>
     </div><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--more" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-more-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar mÃ¡s" aria-expanded="false">Mostrar mÃ¡s
      <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/cyolgscd0imw2ldqppkrb84vo" /></button><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--less" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-less-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar menos" aria-expanded="true">Mostrar menos
      <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/4chtt12k98xwnba1nimld2oyg" /></button>
    </section>
   </div>

    <li class="job-criteria__item"><h3 class="job-criteria__subheader">Nivel de antigÃ¼edad</h3><span class="job-criteria__text job-criteria__text--criteria">Algo de responsabilidad</span></li>

   <p>Enviar mensaje directo al anunciante de Wallapop</p>
   <div class="base-main-card">
    <img class="artdeco-entity-image artdeco-entity-image--profile artdeco-entity-image--circle-4 lazy-load" data-delayed-url="https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQGLinNmSpN1PA/profile-displayphoto-shrink_100_100/0?e=1611187200&amp;v=beta&amp;t=JrGvlxdHIe0OlNkh5jpEQSRTO4brG8Ibnk7WEBK8hyM" data-ghost-classes="artdeco-entity-image--ghost artdeco-entity-image--ghost-profile" data-ghost-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/efkb5179rslll10nmhystl3wx" alt="JesÃºs Horcajo">
    <div class="base-main-card__info">
     <h3 class="base-main-card__title">JesÃºs Horcajo</h3>
     <h4 class="base-main-card__subtitle">Talent Acquisition en Wallapop</h4>
    </div><a aria-label="Enviar mensaje a JesÃºs Horcajo" class="message-the-recruiter__cta" href="https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fes%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fin%2Fjesushorcajo&amp;emailAddress=&amp;fromSignIn=&amp;trk=public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-will-navigate>
     <icon class="message-the-recruiter__cta-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/em62t8ujch4hqqc45owxy6auu" data-tracking-will-navigate /></a>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
   <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
    <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
     <p>Wallapop was founded in 2013. We are the marketplace for second-hand goods in Spain. With more than 8 million searches per day and over 15 million users across Spain with a catalog of several hundreds of millions of products, we exist to empower people to promote a more conscious and human way of consumption. We achieve this by bringing together the scale and simplicity of classifieds with the convenience and the reach of marketplace to create the worldâ€™s best unique goods trading platform.&nbsp;</p>
     <p><br></p>
     <p>Wallapop takes pride in having an open culture, where every opinion matters and everybody contributes in many different ways; through different internal cross-functional clubs aligning with peopleâ€™s passions and interests.&nbsp;</p>
     <p><br></p>
     <p>We count 26 nationalities within our employee base and we operate in 2 languages:&nbsp;Spanish and English - this makes us pretty fun and special. While in most cases we are not attached to one language or the other, we encourage talent to embrace both languages and be able to operate outside their comfort zone. To ensure success we facilitate group and individual Spanish and English classes as part of our working day.</p>
     <p><br></p>
     <p>Our company <strong>values</strong> are:</p>
     <p>We are One Team: Communicative, trusting and inclusive</p>
     <p>We Dream &amp; Deliver: Creative, impactful, pragmatic</p>
     <p>We Aim for Simplicity: Intentional, uncomplicated, humble</p>
     <p>We Learn &amp; Grow: Constructive feedback, curiosity</p>
     <p><br></p>
     <p>&nbsp;We organize ourselves into topic teams and embrace agile practices.</p>
     <p><br></p>
     <p>The&nbsp;<strong>day to day&nbsp;as a Backend Engineer </strong>involves:</p>
     <ul>
      <li>Writing Java or Kotlin code, it depends on the team, the stack could change a little bit</li>
      <li>Developing new features following DDD (tactical design and strategical design)</li>
      <li>Tackling legacy parts</li>
      <li>Testing all the things! Testing is a must, especially if you want to avoid those friendly reminders during the code review</li>
     </ul>
     <p>&nbsp;</p>
     <p><strong>The challenge</strong></p>
     <p>Some of the interesting things we are currently doing include finding new ways to handle with complexity or improve resiliency. We use many different AWS technologies (computer, storage ...) to archive our goals. As a Wallapop backend engineer, we have ownership of the team microservices, so we really embrace DevOps philosophy (optionally backend stuff is who are on duty). Itâ€™s difficult to explain our stack but the most important parts are:</p>
     <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Java &amp; Kotlin</p>
     <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Spring &amp; Axon Framework</p>
     <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;RabbitMQ</p>
     <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;MySql, DynamoDb, Redis &amp; Memcached</p>
     <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Docker</p>
     <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ElasticSearch &amp; Solr</p>
     <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;AWS: S3, ECS, CloudWatch, RDS, CloudFormation, Lambdas &amp; more</p>
     <p><br></p>
     <p>We are really friendly and expect any new members to join us to be respectful, appreciate diversity, and have a sense of humor. We are constantly learning new technologies, acquiring new skills, as things change fast at Wallapop. And Wallapop is aware of that fact, so every employee has a budget for courses and conferences.</p>
     <p>&nbsp;</p>
     <p><strong>Who you are</strong></p>
     <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Problem solver and critical thinking</p>
     <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Quality driven, attention to detail and pragmatic Ì£</p>
     <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Adaptable and eager to learn</p>
     <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A sense of humor: we like having fun doing what we love :)</p>
     <p><br></p>
     <p><strong>Wallapop is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees</strong></p>
     <p><br></p>
     <p>Our <strong>hiring process</strong>:&nbsp;</p>
     <p><br></p>
     <p>* PLEASE NOTE THAT DUE TO THE CURRENT COVID19 SITUATION ALL INTERVIEWS TAKE PLACE REMOTELY OVER HANGOUTS*</p>
     <p><br></p>
     <ol>
      <li><strong>Intro Call</strong> - ran by talent acquisition. It will take 30-45 minutes and will focus on giving you more information about the role and the company as well as going over your experience and expectations.</li>
      <li><strong>Take-home test: </strong>you will be assigned a test that you should complete in few days which is aimed at assessing your technical skills required for the role.&nbsp;</li>
      <li><strong>Competency Interview</strong> - ran by talent acquisition and hiring manager. We will focus on gaining insights and understanding of how you operate in the workplace and your fit to our values. This usually takes 45 min to 1 hour.</li>
      <li><strong>Practical interview -</strong> ran by the hiring team and relevant stakeholders across other functions. The focus will be on assessing your ability to apply your skillset to the wallapop context.&nbsp;</li>
      <li><strong>Offer</strong> - should you be the right candidate, your offer will be discussed over a call with talent acquisition and will then be confirmed in writing.&nbsp;</li>
     </ol>
     <p><br></p>
     <p><strong>Benefits</strong></p>
     <ul>
      <li>Flexible working hours</li>
      <li>Reduced hours on Fridays</li>
      <li>Personal learning budget</li>
      <li>English/Spanish lessons</li>
      <li>Encouraging, fun and team-focused offsite trips twice a year</li>
      <li>Team building activities</li>
      <li>Private Health Insurance (Cigna)</li>
      <li>Gym discounts</li>
      <li>Free office sports classes.</li>
      <li>Other benefits paid from the gross salary (kindergarten check, food check, transport check).</li>
      <li>You'll enjoy a 50% longer maternity/paternity leave</li>
      <li>New born or adoption bonus</li>
      <li>Referral Program &amp; charity donation</li>
      <li>Tax Advice</li>
     </ul>

<h1 class="topcard__title">Backend Engineer (Kotlin/Java)</h1>
<h3 class="topcard__flavor-row"><span class="topcard__flavor"><a class="topcard__org-name-link topcard__flavor--black-link" target="_blank" rel="noopener" href="https://es.linkedin.com/company/wallapop?trk=public_jobs_topcard_org_name" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_topcard_org_name" data-tracking-will-navigate>Wallapop</a></span><span class="topcard__flavor topcard__flavor--bullet">Badia del VallÃ¨s</span></h3>

<section class="description">
 <div class="message-the-recruiter">
  <p>Enviar mensaje directo al anunciante de Wallapop</p>
  <div class="base-main-card">
   <img class="artdeco-entity-image artdeco-entity-image--profile artdeco-entity-image--circle-4 lazy-load" data-delayed-url="https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQGLinNmSpN1PA/profile-displayphoto-shrink_100_100/0?e=1611187200&amp;v=beta&amp;t=JrGvlxdHIe0OlNkh5jpEQSRTO4brG8Ibnk7WEBK8hyM" data-ghost-classes="artdeco-entity-image--ghost artdeco-entity-image--ghost-profile" data-ghost-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/efkb5179rslll10nmhystl3wx" alt="JesÃºs Horcajo">
   <div class="base-main-card__info">
    <h3 class="base-main-card__title">JesÃºs Horcajo</h3>
    <h4 class="base-main-card__subtitle">Talent Acquisition en Wallapop</h4>
   </div><a aria-label="Enviar mensaje a JesÃºs Horcajo" class="message-the-recruiter__cta" href="https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fes%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fin%2Fjesushorcajo&amp;emailAddress=&amp;fromSignIn=&amp;trk=public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-will-navigate>
    <icon class="message-the-recruiter__cta-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/em62t8ujch4hqqc45owxy6auu" data-tracking-will-navigate /></a>
  </div>
 </div>
 <div class="description__text description__text--rich">
  <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
   <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
    <p>Wallapop was founded in 2013. We are the marketplace for second-hand goods in Spain. With more than 8 million searches per day and over 15 million users across Spain with a catalog of several hundreds of millions of products, we exist to empower people to promote a more conscious and human way of consumption. We achieve this by bringing together the scale and simplicity of classifieds with the convenience and the reach of marketplace to create the worldâ€™s best unique goods trading platform.&nbsp;</p>
    <p><br></p>
    <p>Wallapop takes pride in having an open culture, where every opinion matters and everybody contributes in many different ways; through different internal cross-functional clubs aligning with peopleâ€™s passions and interests.&nbsp;</p>
    <p><br></p>
    <p>We count 26 nationalities within our employee base and we operate in 2 languages:&nbsp;Spanish and English - this makes us pretty fun and special. While in most cases we are not attached to one language or the other, we encourage talent to embrace both languages and be able to operate outside their comfort zone. To ensure success we facilitate group and individual Spanish and English classes as part of our working day.</p>
    <p><br></p>
    <p>Our company <strong>values</strong> are:</p>
    <p>We are One Team: Communicative, trusting and inclusive</p>
    <p>We Dream &amp; Deliver: Creative, impactful, pragmatic</p>
    <p>We Aim for Simplicity: Intentional, uncomplicated, humble</p>
    <p>We Learn &amp; Grow: Constructive feedback, curiosity</p>
    <p><br></p>
    <p>&nbsp;We organize ourselves into topic teams and embrace agile practices.</p>
    <p><br></p>
    <p>The&nbsp;<strong>day to day&nbsp;as a Backend Engineer </strong>involves:</p>
    <ul>
     <li>Writing Java or Kotlin code, it depends on the team, the stack could change a little bit</li>
     <li>Developing new features following DDD (tactical design and strategical design)</li>
     <li>Tackling legacy parts</li>
     <li>Testing all the things! Testing is a must, especially if you want to avoid those friendly reminders during the code review</li>
    </ul>
    <p>&nbsp;</p>
    <p><strong>The challenge</strong></p>
    <p>Some of the interesting things we are currently doing include finding new ways to handle with complexity or improve resiliency. We use many different AWS technologies (computer, storage ...) to archive our goals. As a Wallapop backend engineer, we have ownership of the team microservices, so we really embrace DevOps philosophy (optionally backend stuff is who are on duty). Itâ€™s difficult to explain our stack but the most important parts are:</p>
    <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Java &amp; Kotlin</p>
    <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Spring &amp; Axon Framework</p>
    <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;RabbitMQ</p>
    <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;MySql, DynamoDb, Redis &amp; Memcached</p>
    <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Docker</p>
    <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ElasticSearch &amp; Solr</p>
    <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;AWS: S3, ECS, CloudWatch, RDS, CloudFormation, Lambdas &amp; more</p>
    <p><br></p>
    <p>We are really friendly and expect any new members to join us to be respectful, appreciate diversity, and have a sense of humor. We are constantly learning new technologies, acquiring new skills, as things change fast at Wallapop. And Wallapop is aware of that fact, so every employee has a budget for courses and conferences.</p>
    <p>&nbsp;</p>
    <p><strong>Who you are</strong></p>
    <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Problem solver and critical thinking</p>
    <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Quality driven, attention to detail and pragmatic Ì£</p>
    <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Adaptable and eager to learn</p>
    <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A sense of humor: we like having fun doing what we love :)</p>
    <p><br></p>
    <p><strong>Wallapop is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees</strong></p>
    <p><br></p>
    <p>Our <strong>hiring process</strong>:&nbsp;</p>
    <p><br></p>
    <p>* PLEASE NOTE THAT DUE TO THE CURRENT COVID19 SITUATION ALL INTERVIEWS TAKE PLACE REMOTELY OVER HANGOUTS*</p>
    <p><br></p>
    <ol>
     <li><strong>Intro Call</strong> - ran by talent acquisition. It will take 30-45 minutes and will focus on giving you more information about the role and the company as well as going over your experience and expectations.</li>
     <li><strong>Take-home test: </strong>you will be assigned a test that you should complete in few days which is aimed at assessing your technical skills required for the role.&nbsp;</li>
     <li><strong>Competency Interview</strong> - ran by talent acquisition and hiring manager. We will focus on gaining insights and understanding of how you operate in the workplace and your fit to our values. This usually takes 45 min to 1 hour.</li>
     <li><strong>Practical interview -</strong> ran by the hiring team and relevant stakeholders across other functions. The focus will be on assessing your ability to apply your skillset to the wallapop context.&nbsp;</li>
     <li><strong>Offer</strong> - should you be the right candidate, your offer will be discussed over a call with talent acquisition and will then be confirmed in writing.&nbsp;</li>
    </ol>
    <p><br></p>
    <p><strong>Benefits</strong></p>
    <ul>
     <li>Flexible working hours</li>
     <li>Reduced hours on Fridays</li>
     <li>Personal learning budget</li>
     <li>English/Spanish lessons</li>
     <li>Encouraging, fun and team-focused offsite trips twice a year</li>
     <li>Team building activities</li>
     <li>Private Health Insurance (Cigna)</li>
     <li>Gym discounts</li>
     <li>Free office sports classes.</li>
     <li>Other benefits paid from the gross salary (kindergarten check, food check, transport check).</li>
     <li>You'll enjoy a 50% longer maternity/paternity leave</li>
     <li>New born or adoption bonus</li>
     <li>Referral Program &amp; charity donation</li>
     <li>Tax Advice</li>
    </ul>
   </div><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--more" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-more-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar mÃ¡s" aria-expanded="false">Mostrar mÃ¡s
    <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/cyolgscd0imw2ldqppkrb84vo" /></button><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--less" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-less-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar menos" aria-expanded="true">Mostrar menos
    <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/4chtt12k98xwnba1nimld2oyg" /></button>

<div class="base-main-card__info">
 <h3 class="base-main-card__title">JesÃºs Horcajo</h3>
 <h4 class="base-main-card__subtitle">Talent Acquisition en Wallapop</h4>
</div>
<h3 class="base-main-card__title">JesÃºs Horcajo</h3>
<h4 class="base-main-card__subtitle">Talent Acquisition en Wallapop</h4>
<a aria-label="Enviar mensaje a JesÃºs Horcajo" class="message-the-recruiter__cta" href="https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fes%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fin%2Fjesushorcajo&amp;emailAddress=&amp;fromSignIn=&amp;trk=public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_message-the-recruiter-cta" data-tracking-will-navigate>
 <icon class="message-the-recruiter__cta-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/em62t8ujch4hqqc45owxy6auu" data-tracking-will-navigate /></a>
<icon class="message-the-recruiter__cta-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/em62t8ujch4hqqc45owxy6auu" data-tracking-will-navigate />
<div class="description__text description__text--rich">
 <section class="show-more-less-html" data-max-lines="5">
  <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
   <p>Wallapop was founded in 2013. We are the marketplace for second-hand goods in Spain. With more than 8 million searches per day and over 15 million users across Spain with a catalog of several hundreds of millions of products, we exist to empower people to promote a more conscious and human way of consumption. We achieve this by bringing together the scale and simplicity of classifieds with the convenience and the reach of marketplace to create the worldâ€™s best unique goods trading platform.&nbsp;</p>
   <p><br></p>
   <p>Wallapop takes pride in having an open culture, where every opinion matters and everybody contributes in many different ways; through different internal cross-functional clubs aligning with peopleâ€™s passions and interests.&nbsp;</p>
   <p><br></p>
   <p>We count 26 nationalities within our employee base and we operate in 2 languages:&nbsp;Spanish and English - this makes us pretty fun and special. While in most cases we are not attached to one language or the other, we encourage talent to embrace both languages and be able to operate outside their comfort zone. To ensure success we facilitate group and individual Spanish and English classes as part of our working day.</p>
   <p><br></p>
   <p>Our company <strong>values</strong> are:</p>
   <p>We are One Team: Communicative, trusting and inclusive</p>
   <p>We Dream &amp; Deliver: Creative, impactful, pragmatic</p>
   <p>We Aim for Simplicity: Intentional, uncomplicated, humble</p>
   <p>We Learn &amp; Grow: Constructive feedback, curiosity</p>
   <p><br></p>
   <p>&nbsp;We organize ourselves into topic teams and embrace agile practices.</p>
   <p><br></p>
   <p>The&nbsp;<strong>day to day&nbsp;as a Backend Engineer </strong>involves:</p>
   <ul>
    <li>Writing Java or Kotlin code, it depends on the team, the stack could change a little bit</li>
    <li>Developing new features following DDD (tactical design and strategical design)</li>
    <li>Tackling legacy parts</li>
    <li>Testing all the things! Testing is a must, especially if you want to avoid those friendly reminders during the code review</li>
   </ul>
   <p>&nbsp;</p>
   <p><strong>The challenge</strong></p>
   <p>Some of the interesting things we are currently doing include finding new ways to handle with complexity or improve resiliency. We use many different AWS technologies (computer, storage ...) to archive our goals. As a Wallapop backend engineer, we have ownership of the team microservices, so we really embrace DevOps philosophy (optionally backend stuff is who are on duty). Itâ€™s difficult to explain our stack but the most important parts are:</p>
   <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Java &amp; Kotlin</p>
   <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Spring &amp; Axon Framework</p>
   <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;RabbitMQ</p>
   <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;MySql, DynamoDb, Redis &amp; Memcached</p>
   <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Docker</p>
   <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ElasticSearch &amp; Solr</p>
   <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;AWS: S3, ECS, CloudWatch, RDS, CloudFormation, Lambdas &amp; more</p>
   <p><br></p>
   <p>We are really friendly and expect any new members to join us to be respectful, appreciate diversity, and have a sense of humor. We are constantly learning new technologies, acquiring new skills, as things change fast at Wallapop. And Wallapop is aware of that fact, so every employee has a budget for courses and conferences.</p>
   <p>&nbsp;</p>
   <p><strong>Who you are</strong></p>
   <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Problem solver and critical thinking</p>
   <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Quality driven, attention to detail and pragmatic Ì£</p>
   <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Adaptable and eager to learn</p>
   <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A sense of humor: we like having fun doing what we love :)</p>
   <p><br></p>
   <p><strong>Wallapop is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees</strong></p>
   <p><br></p>
   <p>Our <strong>hiring process</strong>:&nbsp;</p>
   <p><br></p>
   <p>* PLEASE NOTE THAT DUE TO THE CURRENT COVID19 SITUATION ALL INTERVIEWS TAKE PLACE REMOTELY OVER HANGOUTS*</p>
   <p><br></p>
   <ol>
    <li><strong>Intro Call</strong> - ran by talent acquisition. It will take 30-45 minutes and will focus on giving you more information about the role and the company as well as going over your experience and expectations.</li>
    <li><strong>Take-home test: </strong>you will be assigned a test that you should complete in few days which is aimed at assessing your technical skills required for the role.&nbsp;</li>
    <li><strong>Competency Interview</strong> - ran by talent acquisition and hiring manager. We will focus on gaining insights and understanding of how you operate in the workplace and your fit to our values. This usually takes 45 min to 1 hour.</li>
    <li><strong>Practical interview -</strong> ran by the hiring team and relevant stakeholders across other functions. The focus will be on assessing your ability to apply your skillset to the wallapop context.&nbsp;</li>
    <li><strong>Offer</strong> - should you be the right candidate, your offer will be discussed over a call with talent acquisition and will then be confirmed in writing.&nbsp;</li>
   </ol>
   <p><br></p>
   <p><strong>Benefits</strong></p>
   <ul>
    <li>Flexible working hours</li>
    <li>Reduced hours on Fridays</li>
    <li>Personal learning budget</li>
    <li>English/Spanish lessons</li>
    <li>Encouraging, fun and team-focused offsite trips twice a year</li>
    <li>Team building activities</li>
    <li>Private Health Insurance (Cigna)</li>
    <li>Gym discounts</li>
    <li>Free office sports classes.</li>
    <li>Other benefits paid from the gross salary (kindergarten check, food check, transport check).</li>
    <li>You'll enjoy a 50% longer maternity/paternity leave</li>
    <li>New born or adoption bonus</li>
    <li>Referral Program &amp; charity donation</li>
    <li>Tax Advice</li>
   </ul>
  </div><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--more" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-more-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar mÃ¡s" aria-expanded="false">Mostrar mÃ¡s
   <icon class="show-more-less-html__button-icon" data-delayed-url="https://static-exp3.licdn.com/sc/h/cyolgscd0imw2ldqppkrb84vo" /></button><button class="show-more-less-html__button show-more-less-html__button--less" data-tracking-control-name="public_jobs_show-less-html-btn" aria-label="Mostrar menos" aria-expanded="true">Mostrar menos

 </section>
</div>

 <div class="show-more-less-html__markup show-more-less-html__markup--clamp-after-5">
  <p>Wallapop was founded in 2013. We are the marketplace for second-hand goods in Spain. With more than 8 million searches per day and over 15 million users across Spain with a catalog of several hundreds of millions of products, we exist to empower people to promote a more conscious and human way of consumption. We achieve this by bringing together the scale and simplicity of classifieds with the convenience and the reach of marketplace to create the worldâ€™s best unique goods trading platform.&nbsp;</p>
  <p><br></p>
  <p>Wallapop takes pride in having an open culture, where every opinion matters and everybody contributes in many different ways; through different internal cross-functional clubs aligning with peopleâ€™s passions and interests.&nbsp;</p>
  <p><br></p>
  <p>We count 26 nationalities within our employee base and we operate in 2 languages:&nbsp;Spanish and English - this makes us pretty fun and special. While in most cases we are not attached to one language or the other, we encourage talent to embrace both languages and be able to operate outside their comfort zone.   <p><br></p>
  <p>Our company <strong>values</strong> are:</p>
  <p>We are One Team: Communicative, trusting and inclusive</p>

   <li>Writing Java or Kotlin code, it depends on the team, the stack could change a little bit</li>
   <li>Developing new features following DDD (tactical design and strategical design)</li>
   <li>Tackling legacy parts</li>
   <li>Testing all the things! Testing is a must, especially if you want to avoid those friendly reminders during the code review</li>
  </ul>
  <p>&nbsp;</p>
  <p><strong>The challenge</strong></p>
  <p>Some of the interesting things we are currently doing include finding new ways to handle with complexity or improve resiliency. We use many different AWS technologies (computer, storage ...) to archive our goals. As a Wallapop backend engineer, we have ownership of the team microservices, so we really embrace DevOps philosophy (optionally backend stuff is who are on duty). Itâ€™s difficult to explain our stack but the most important parts are:</p>
  <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Java &amp; Kotlin</p>

  <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;MySql, DynamoDb, Redis &amp; Memcached</p>
  <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Docker</p>
  <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ElasticSearch &amp; Solr</p>
  <p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;AWS: S3, ECS, CloudWatch, RDS, CloudFormation, Lambdas &amp; more</p>
  <p><br></p>
  <p>We are really friendly and expect any new members to join us to be respectful, appreciate diversity, and have a sense of humor. <p>Wallapop was founded in 2013. We are the marketplace for second-hand goods in Spain. With more than 8 million searches per day and over 15 million users across Spain with a catalog of several hundreds of millions of products, we exist to empower people to promote a more conscious and human way of consumption. We achieve this by bringing together the scale and simplicity of classifieds with the convenience and the reach of marketplace to create the worldâ€™s best unique goods trading platform.&nbsp;</p>
<p><br></p>
<br>
<p>Wallapop takes pride in having an open culture, where every opinion matters and everybody contributes in many different ways; through different internal cross-functional clubs aligning with peopleâ€™s passions and interests.&nbsp;</p>
<p><br></p>
<br>
<p>We count 26 nationalities within our employee base and we operate in 2 languages:&nbsp;Spanish and English - this makes us pretty fun and special. While in most cases we are not attached to one language or the other, we encourage talent to embrace both languages and be able to operate outside their comfort zone. To ensure success we facilitate group and individual Spanish and English classes as part of our working day.</p>
<p><br></p>
<br>
<p>Our company <strong>values</strong> are:</p>
<strong>values</strong>
<p>We are One Team: Communicative, trusting and inclusive</p>
<p>We Dream &amp; Deliver: Creative, impactful, pragmatic</p>
<p>We Aim for Simplicity: Intentional, uncomplicated, humble</p>
<p>We Learn &amp; Grow: Constructive feedback, curiosity</p>
<p><br></p>
<br>
<p>&nbsp;We organize ourselves into topic teams and embrace agile practices.</p>
<p><br></p>
<br>
<p>The&nbsp;<strong>day to day&nbsp;as a Backend Engineer </strong>involves:</p>
<strong>day to day&nbsp;as a Backend Engineer </strong>
<ul>
 <li>Writing Java or Kotlin code, it depends on the team, the stack could change a little bit</li>
 <li>Developing new features following DDD (tactical design and strategical design)</li>
 <li>Tackling legacy parts</li>
 <li>Testing all the things! Testing is a must, especially if you want to avoid those friendly reminders during the code review</li>
</ul>
<li>Writing Java or Kotlin code, it depends on the team, the stack could change a little bit</li>
<li>Developing new features following DDD (tactical design and strategical design)</li>
<li>Tackling legacy parts</li>
<li>Testing all the things! Testing is a must, especially if you want to avoid those friendly reminders during the code review</li>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>The challenge</strong></p>
<strong>The challenge</strong>
<p>Some of the interesting things we are currently doing include finding new ways to handle with complexity or improve resiliency. We use many different AWS technologies (computer, storage ...) to archive our goals. As a Wallapop backend engineer, we have ownership of the team microservices, so we really embrace DevOps philosophy (optionally backend stuff is who are on duty). Itâ€™s difficult to explain our stack but the most important parts are:</p>
<p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Java &amp; Kotlin</p>
<p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Spring &amp; Axon Framework</p>
<p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;RabbitMQ</p>
<p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;MySql, DynamoDb, Redis &amp; Memcached</p>
<p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Docker</p>
<p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ElasticSearch &amp; Solr</p>
<p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;AWS: S3, ECS, CloudWatch, RDS, CloudFormation, Lambdas &amp; more</p>
<p><br></p>
<br>
<p>We are really friendly and expect any new members to join us to be respectful, appreciate diversity, and have a sense of humor. We are constantly learning new technologies, acquiring new skills, as things change fast at Wallapop. And Wallapop is aware of that fact, so every employee has a budget for courses and conferences.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>Who you are</strong></p>
<strong>Who you are</strong>
<p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Problem solver and critical thinking</p>
<p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Quality driven, attention to detail and pragmatic Ì£</p>
<p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Adaptable and eager to learn</p>
<p>Â·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A sense of humor: we like having fun doing what we love :)</p>

<p><strong>Wallapop is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees</strong></p>
<strong>Wallapop is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees</strong>

<br>
<p>Our <strong>hiring process</strong>:&nbsp;</p>
<strong>hiring process</strong>
<p><br></p>
<br>
<p>* PLEASE NOTE THAT DUE TO THE CURRENT COVID19 SITUATION ALL INTERVIEWS TAKE PLACE REMOTELY OVER HANGOUTS*</p>
<p><br></p>
<br>
<ol>
 <li><strong>Intro Call</strong> - ran by talent acquisition. It will take 30-45 minutes and will focus on giving you more information about the role and the company as well as going over your experience and expectations.</li>
 <li><strong>Take-home test: </strong>you will be assigned a test that you should complete in few days which is aimed at assessing your technical skills required for the role.&nbsp;</li>
 <li><strong>Competency Interview</strong> - ran by talent acquisition and hiring manager. We will focus on gaining insights and understanding of how you operate in the workplace and your fit to our values. This usually takes 45 min to 1 hour.</li>
 <li><strong>Practical interview -</strong> ran by the hiring team and relevant stakeholders across other functions. The focus will be on assessing your ability to apply your skillset to the wallapop context.&nbsp;</li>
 <li><strong>Offer</strong> - should you be the right candidate, your offer will be discussed over a call with talent acquisition and will then be confirmed in writing.&nbsp;</li>
</ol>
<li><strong>Intro Call</strong> - ran by talent acquisition. It will take 30-45 minutes and will focus on giving you more information about the role and the company as well as going over your experience and expectations.</li>
